title: River Raisin National Battlefield Park: Management
body: Management            Below is a list of PDFs you can download relating to the creation of the River Raisin Battlefield park.  (Files are PDFs, get a free PDF reader program here.)     River Raisin Legislation RIRA Legislation - 2009 2010 - Final River Raisin Decision Memo RIRA Federal Register notice Overview of the River Raisin National Battlefield Park Foundation Document River Raisin National Battlefield Park Foundation Document River Raisin National Battlefield Park Study and Boundary Assessment  River Raisin National Battlefield Park Long Range Interpretive Plan (2015) Superintendent's Compendium (May 2016)
